get.summary: Retrieve the Catalogued details of a Product
get.description: Retrieve the Catalogued details of a Product

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Id of the product.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

parameters.name: variation
parameters.description: Additional product specification based on particular criteria for example the account was opened on-line and attracted a higher interest rate. Drop down list to select appropriate variation or applied automatically

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: availableCompany
parameters.description: Contains the available company defined for the deposit contract

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Indicates the term for which the contract is booked

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: This is the payment amount

parameters.name: minTerm
parameters.description: Contains the minimum term defined for the deposit contract

parameters.name: maxTerm
parameters.description: Contains the maximum term defined for the deposit contract

parameters.name: minAmount
parameters.description: Contains the minimum principal amount defined for the deposit contract

parameters.name: interestApplicable
parameters.description: Indicates the interest applicable or not for the deposit contract

parameters.name: rateType
parameters.description: Fixed or floating rate.

parameters.name: rate
parameters.description: The rate applied

parameters.name: baseInterestRate
parameters.description: Contains the base rate used for calculating the interest

parameters.name: standardRate
parameters.description: Contains the standard rate defined for the interest calculation

parameters.name: interestMargin
parameters.description: Contains the margin used for calculating the interest

parameters.name: paymentFrequency
parameters.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

parameters.name: noticeDays
parameters.description: Indicates the number of days prior to rollover or renewal date on which the notice to be sent

parameters.name: productRiskCategory
parameters.description: Contains the product risk category

parameters.name: coolingPeriod
parameters.description: Indicates the number of days to be considered for closure of account after renewal or rollover date

parameters.name: maxAmount
parameters.description: Contains the maximum principal amount defined for the deposit contract

parameters.name: rolloverType
parameters.description: Indicates the type of rollover takes place for the account. During rollover, new interest rate or schedule conditions applied for the payment calculation

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS
